basics.label: Project Coordinator
basics.summary: Effective project coordinator with well developed time management and communication skills. Extensive experience in handling project schedules, managing resources and budgets and facilitating meetings.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage various projects by ensuring effective communication with stakeholders, managing project resources and budgets using tools like MS Project 2013, SAP Guri, and Demand & Supply tool.
highlights: Develop and maintain project schedule information
Manage day to day work priorities of the project manager and team
Develop and maintain risk registers and escalate issues

work.name: Telecom NZ Ltd
work.summary: Coordinated business processes including setting up new WBSE for Capex and Opex Projects, coordinating staff movement to new buildings, managing access to online document systems, and arranging travel & accommodation for managers.
highlights: Set up new WBSE for Capex and Opex Projects
Coordinated staff moving to a new building
Managed access to online documents system

courses: Business planning Book-keeping & Records, Taxation Finance marketing & Presentation
